dict.acceptation: （食物）吃起来感到；咬；（人）感到苦恼（或烦恼）；侵蚀，腐蚀；
（如酸）腐蚀；吃完；吃得使；侵蚀成；

sent.orig: The verb `eat' takes a direct object.
METHODS:Wistar female rats were selected to establish EAT animal models.
sent.trans: 方法：选用雌性Wistar大鼠建立EAT动物模型。

sent.orig: You can use the verb "eat" transitively or intransitively.
sent.trans: 动词“eat”可以用作及物动词和不及物动词。

sent.orig: Objective To investigate the role of interferon regulatory factor(IRF)-1 in the development of experimental autoimmune thyroiditis(EAT).
sent.trans: 目的 探讨干扰素调节因子 (IRF) 1在实验性自发免疫性甲状腺炎 (EAT)发病及进展过程中的作用。

sent.orig: Eat the noodles. Eat the rice. Eat the chicken. Eat the beef.
sent.trans: 吃面条。吃米饭。吃鸡肉。吃牛肉。
